nodes.bodyText: I just thought about something - do we also count terminated here? I just saw activated/completed, but of course it may have been because none of them were terminated. Did you verify? I'm asking because I'm not sure if action !="activated" is enough.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -253,10 +253,10 @@
           "steppedLine": false,
           "targets": [
             {
-              "expr": "sum(rate(zeebe_flow_node_instance_counter{namespace=~\"$namespace\", pod=~\"$pod\"}[1m])) by (partition, type)",
+              "expr": "sum(rate(zeebe_element_instance_events_total{namespace=~\"$namespace\", pod=~\"$pod\", type!=\"PROCESS\", action!=\"activated\"}[1m])) by (partition, action)",
